code: import React from'react';import{motion}from'framer-motion';import{useInView}from'react-intersection-observer';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Growth=()=>{const{ref,inView}=useInView({triggerOnce:true,threshold:0.2});const stages=[{month:'3月',title:'春季发芽',description:'枝条开始萌发新芽，生机勃勃',icon:'🌱'},{month:'5月',title:'开花授粉',description:'洁白的花朵绽放，蜜蜂忙碌授粉',icon:'🌸'},{month:'7月',title:'果实生长',description:'小果实逐渐成形，需要精心呵护',icon:'🥝'},{month:'10月',title:'成熟采摘',description:'果实饱满成熟，开始手工采摘',icon:'🎯'}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{className:"growth-section",ref:ref,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(motion.div,{className:"container",initial:{opacity:0},animate:inView?{opacity:1}:{},transition:{duration:0.8},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(motion.h2,{className:"section-title",initial:{y:30,opacity:0},animate:inView?{y:0,opacity:1}:{},transition:{delay:0.2,duration:0.8},children:"\u751F\u957F\u5386\u7A0B"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"timeline",children:stages.map((stage,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(motion.div,{className:"timeline-item",initial:{x:-50,opacity:0},animate:inView?{x:0,opacity:1}:{},transition:{delay:0.3+index*0.2,duration:0.8},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"timeline-marker",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"stage-icon",children:stage.icon})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"timeline-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:stage.month}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:stage.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:stage.description})]})]},index))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(motion.div,{className:"growth-highlight",initial:{y:30,opacity:0},animate:inView?{y:0,opacity:1}:{},transition:{delay:1.5,duration:0.8},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"highlight-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"\u5168\u7A0B\u6709\u673A\u79CD\u690D"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"\u4ECE\u53D1\u82BD\u5230\u6210\u719F\uFF0C\u6BCF\u4E00\u4E2A\u9636\u6BB5\u90FD\u51DD\u805A\u7740\u5976\u5976\u7684\u5FC3\u8840\u3002 \u4E0D\u4F7F\u7528\u5316\u5B66\u80A5\u6599\uFF0C\u53EA\u65BD\u7528\u6709\u673A\u80A5\uFF0C\u786E\u4FDD\u679C\u5B9E\u7684\u5929\u7136\u54C1\u8D28\u3002"})]})})]})});};export default Growth;
